Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>四星<White>……そして<Blue>王の盾<White>…… オレはクレアを取り戻せるのか……
Entry.EnglishText: Between the <Blue>Four Stars<White> and the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>... Will I be able to get Claire back...?

Entry.JapaneseText: しかも<Blue>王の盾<White>の中には俺も知らない 未知のフォルスを秘めた能力者も多くいるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: There are also those within the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> whose Force are unknown to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……だが、奴らに負けない強い力、 大きな可能性をおまえは秘めている。
Entry.EnglishText: ...However, there lies a strong power within you that could likely stand up to their might.

Entry.JapaneseText: だからこそ、俺たちは おまえのところへ来たんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: That is why we came for you.
